item.description: I'm new to this group and I don't think I know anybody here. I'd like to get together with a group of a few folks on a nice day somewhere around the Middletown area. There are lots of great places to shoot portraits around here, like Gillette Castle, Wadsworth Mansion, around Wesleyan, run-down buildings (ha!) etc. I'm open to suggestions from anyone with an interest! I can bring along some reflectors and other modifiers that we can use and I thought we could each rotate as assistant, subject, and photographer, if that makes sense. There's an opportunity for a really great collaborative learning experience!
item.why: Spring is in full swing and I'd like to meet other people with an interest in creative portraiture!
item.name: Location Portraiture Collaboration
